thread.title: Mr Andrew Dodd
thread.title_full: Mikes Dive Store reviewed by Mr Andrew Dodd

author: Mr Andrew Dodd
title: Mr Andrew Dodd
text:
It's always great to know that there is a real shop on the other side of the internet portal that you can call for advice, and the guys at Mikes Dive Store are all experienced divers and happy to share this with you either on the telephone or in person in the store.
Items ordered arrived on time, and where exactly as listed on the site.
